name: Blood Bowl (1995)
description:
The crowd roars as the Darkside Cowboys and Gouged Eye take to the battle field. The hottest spot in the Warhammer Universe is about to get underway. This world had largely forgotten our current society until the discovery of an old stadium unleashed this strangely transmuted version of American Football. The creatures and humans of this universe now play Blood Bowl with lethal intensity.
A sports strategy simulation based on the original game design by Games Workshop*

8 authentic Blood Bowl teams with original fight songs

*   League, season and exhibition battles
*   Trading and free agent claiming options
*   Instant replay and exclusive "Sky-Eye" Blimp Cam
*   Single or two player competition
*   Head-to-head modem play
*   Humans, orcs, dwarfs, skeletons and real ugly cheerleaders
